data.title: My Portfolio
data.description: You are here. This website is created using React and HTML/CSS to provide a reponsive layout for phone/tablet/desktop.

data.title: Bill Tracker
data.description: A web application that allows user to enter their bills and display all of it in a table format hosted on MongoDB Atlas. Angular is hosted on Github.io with Express server hosted on Heroku. Future plan: charts and statistics for users' spending habits!

data.title: VR Engineering Education
data.description: A Unity application that replicates engineering models within the virtual space with the aim to improve users' problems solving skills and understanding of physics in 3D space

data.title: Collabware
data.description: An Android application that allow users' to search for teammates to collaborate on tech projects

data.title: Shifter
data.description: A Unity game made in the style of a classic scroller shooter with the option to swtich to 3rd person shooter
